actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the deductions for intangible drilling and development expenses and for depletion to geothermal resources.

summary.text: Extends the tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for intangible drilling and development expenses and for depletion to geothermal resources.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the deductions for intangible drilling and development expenses and for depletion to geothermal resources.
